content: 480 GB Old Arcade Games CollectionPrice 29€Games Room From the 70s-80s-90s Exceptional Mame Suite 480gb of Roms Version 0.240 and 0.217 + Chd + PicturesAre You Nostalgic of the 70's-80's and 90's Playgrounds and Would You Like to Replay the Titles That Marked Your Childhood?You Spent Hours and Hours in Front of Those Big Wooden Furniture, Which Looked Like Technology Monsters, With Asteroids; Space Invaders ; Donkey Kong ; Mr.do! ; Wonder Boy and Many Others…And Although the Graphics Were Not Beautiful, in Fact, in Some Games They Sucked, They Were Fantastic.All This is Now Possible,Thanks to This Fantastic and One of the Most Complete Collections in Circulation Mame32 Version 0.217 With 200gb Roms and Chd + Mame 32 Vers 0.240 With 280 Gb Roms and Chd Plus Launch Images and Games Icons!!!No Shipping, I Will Send My Server Links, Where You Can Download 480gb of Roms + Chd + Emulator + Video Guide in 4gb Archives, All Already Ready to Play Without Any Installation!The Games Automatically Start Without Any Installation.Direct Link for Mame32 0.240 and Mame32 0.217 DownloadDirect Link to Download 480gb of MameNo Shipping, I Will Send the Direct Links to My Server Which Will Be at Your Disposal Even for a Maximum of 12 Hours for a Year, Where You Will Be Able to Download 480 Gb of Games in 4 Gb Archives Ready
